introduction.title: Bridging the Educational Gap in
introduction.paragraph1: In Ethiopia's educational landscape, many students struggle to access quality, personalized tutoring that meets their individual needs. Traditional educational systems often fall short of providing the one-on-one attention that students require to truly excel.
introduction.paragraph2: Bright Minds Tutoring directly addresses this gap by offering reliable, personalized, and high-quality academic mentorship from Ethiopia's top-performing medical students and doctors, combining strong subject knowledge with inspirational mentorship.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: To become Ethiopia's leading educational platform that transforms students into confident, capable, and inspired learners who are equipped to excel in their academic pursuits and beyond.
vision.paragraph2: We envision a future where every student, regardless of their background or learning challenges, has access to world-class tutoring and mentorship that unlocks their full potential.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: To provide exceptional, personalized tutoring services that combine academic excellence with mentorship, empowering students to achieve their educational goals while building confidence and character.
goals: Support students with diverse learning needs

hero.title: Terms and Conditions
hero.subtitle: Understanding our service agreement and policies

terms.introduction: These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") form the agreement between BrightMinds Tutoring Center ("BrightMinds," "we," "our"), the Tutors who provide academic support through our platform, and the Clients/Families who use our services. By registering with BrightMinds, booking lessons, or providing tutoring, you agree to follow these Terms.

purpose.title: 1. Purpose of the Service
purpose.content: BrightMinds Tutoring Center connects families with qualified tutors for academic support. We organize scheduling, coordination, and provide general oversight. BrightMinds is not a school, an employer of tutors, or responsible for guaranteeing student results. Our role is to facilitate learning partnerships between Tutors and Clients.

eligibility.title: 2. Eligibility
points: Tutors must go through BrightMinds' approval process, which includes screening and professional standards.
Clients must be 18 years or older and legally able to enter contracts under Ethiopian law.
Parents/guardians are responsible for ensuring a safe learning space and proper supervision when the student is a minor.
Improper or unlawful use of our services may result in suspension or termination.

independentRelationship.title: 3. Independent Relationship
independentRelationship.description: Tutors working through BrightMinds are independent providers, not employees. This means:
points: Tutors are not entitled to employee benefits or protections under Ethiopian labor law.
Clients may not treat Tutors as household staff or employees.
Tutors may not represent themselves as official agents of BrightMinds outside of tutoring arrangements.

agreeTo.title: Tutors agree to:
points: Arrive prepared and on time.
Deliver sessions professionally.
Maintain privacy and respect.
Follow BrightMinds' ethical standards.

mustNot.title: Tutors must not:
points: Request off-platform payments.
Share personal contact information for non-tutoring purposes.
Perform non-academic tasks (such as errands or babysitting).

clientResponsibilities.title: 5. Responsibilities of Clients
points: Provide a safe and quiet study environment.
Respect the boundaries of tutors' roles.
Make timely payments for sessions.
Communicate concerns directly with BrightMinds, not privately with Tutors.

payments.title: 6. Payments
points: Payments should be made through BrightMinds unless otherwise approved.
Any payment made directly to a Tutor must be reported to BrightMinds for record-keeping.
BrightMinds may charge service or coordination fees.
Refunds and adjustments are handled at BrightMinds' discretion.

learningOutcomes.title: 7. Learning Outcomes
learningOutcomes.content: Tutoring aims to support academic growth, but BrightMinds cannot promise specific grades, results, or guaranteed improvement. Learning depends on the combined effort of the student, family, and tutor.

refundPolicy.title: 8. Refund Policy
refundPolicy.content: Refunds are reviewed individually. Prepaid lessons may be refunded, credited, or forfeited depending on the situation. Repeated cancellations or contract violations may affect refund eligibility.

cancellations.title: 9. Cancellations & Rescheduling
points: Tutors and Clients may reschedule lessons if both agree.
Repeated cancellations or last-minute changes should be reported to BrightMinds for review or reassignment.

limitationOfLiability.title: 10. Limitation of Liability
limitationOfLiability.description: BrightMinds is not responsible for damages, losses, or conflicts that occur during tutoring sessions. By using our services, Tutors and Clients agree to release BrightMinds from claims related to:
points: Misconduct or negligence by either party,
Property damage or privacy issues,
Emotional or physical harm,
Student academic performance.

privacy.title: 11. Privacy and Confidentiality
points: Tutors must keep student information confidential.
Clients may not misuse Tutor details (such as photos or contact information).
BrightMinds only collects data necessary for service delivery and will not share it without consent, except when legally required.

termination.title: 12. Termination
termination.description: BrightMinds may suspend or end services for:
points: Violation of these Terms,
Nonpayment,
Safety concerns or misconduct.
termination.additional: Clients and Tutors may also end their engagement by notifying BrightMinds.

sharedInformation.title: 13. Use of Shared Information
sharedInformation.content: Information shared between Tutors and Clients should be used only for educational purposes. Personal information must be protected and not shared with third parties without consent.
